Okay, Ashok da, he is one of our past chairmen and trustee. How did you get involved in festival, Ashok da, and when it was?
I've been in this country for the past 35 years and I got involved directly with the Welsh Pooja Committee and Durga Puja in 1984-85.
Puja in those days was held at the parade on a lot smaller scale than it is held now.
My association with the puja was because of friends who were involved in the puja and I became part of the group and put my efforts into helping with the functions and the puja.
Who were the people at that time when you started attending the puja? Can you remember that?
Yes, I can recall a lot of people actually. The senior members, we used to have a purohit, Mr Banerjee, I remember him quite vividly.

And then the younger lot came in afterwards and then unfortunately around that time I left the country, I went away for five years and I lost complete touch till I came back again in 1994.

Yes, I think my first venue I recall is at the parade which was in the early 80s and then I also remember having moved from the parade to the swimming pool.
